original_title: The 90's, Startling End-Time Signs & YOUR Future
overview: The man known as "The Walking Bible" and renowned as a foremost prophecy scholar shares revelations received during months of intensive prayer and study.
tagline: What startling, specific end-time events will be fulfilled to this decade of the 90s?  How will they affect your future?
title: The 90's, Startling End-Time Signs & YOUR Future
